name: Jackie Chan Adventures Season 2

info_box.中文名:: 成龙历险记 第二季

summary: In the finale of Season 1, the Chans traveled to Hong Kong and defeated Shendu, whereupon Jade destroyed the demon with the Dragon Talisman. After the defeat of Shendu, a new void is present to be filled by a new evil. Trapped in the Netherworld as a spirit, Shendu comes to reckoning with his brothers and sisters who schedule an eternal torment for the treacherous dragon. Hoping to be spared by his siblings, Shendu promises them freedom in the form of the Pan'ku Box. The Chans battle and seal the eight demon Sorcerers. After his defeat, Shendu is continually tormented by his brethren. Hoping to escape punishment Shendu confides to his siblings of the Book of Ages, an ancient book where all history is magically recorded. Possessing Jackie's body Shendu travels to Australia and successfully re-writes history into a parallel Demon World.
Other episodes include side quests such as El Chupacabra, Spring Heel Jack etc. and introduces Daolon Wong for Season Three. Three episodes are also placed within the Season One timespan.

user_intros.name: Augustus Black / 奥古斯都·布莱克

complaints: 小时候还以为是国产动画来着，童年回忆啊
比许多冲击波日漫强太多
这条目的单集顺序太乱了我去，左点个格子右点一个格子/八大恶魔后的非主线单元剧略显无趣/不是略显无趣，是很无趣……//决定了，直接跳过这些无趣的单元剧看第三季
美漫评价：致以童年的经典。

成龙历险记作为我童年时期播出的动画作品，陪伴我走过了无忧无虑的小学假期时光，每当我回忆起在炎热的夏日，开启空调，在无人的家里闲适地看着电视，在床上或者沙发上不安分地蹦来蹦去，等待着爷爷奶奶下午打牌归来的那份年少时独有的美好，电视上正播放的作品中，一定有它一份位置。而即使抛开童年的滤镜，成龙历险记本身紧凑的故事结构，充满趣味和幽默感的故事，流畅的打斗部分还有个性鲜明的人物塑造，也足以让它跻身佳作之列
